storyInfo:
Back at Tomimi's tribe, the bored pilot Dylan chats with Lancet-2.
The Doctor's team is taking a break under a huge waterfall when Ceobe bursts in and charges toward Zumama's tribe.

attributes.content: Lancet-2, I have a serious question.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Isn't your battery running low?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry about that. Before we left, the lovely Ms. Closure fitted me with a brand new, extra long-lasting battery.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Theoretically, I could function for a week without needing a charge.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: The aircraft is also carrying spare batteries, so you don't have to worry about me.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Now where did Kay run off to? On our way back, the kiddo suddenly hopped to her feet and jetted away.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: It's true, we should be concerned about Ceobe's condition, but considering her strength and constitution, we don't need to be too concerned.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: That's true.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Hah, I'm bored.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: We fixed up the aircraft, patched up the wounded Gavial sent over, and now we've got nothing to do.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: That we can't speak the local language is just a cherry on top. I should've gone to that ceremony with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: The aircraft is an important Rhodes Island asset, it's our responsibility to guard it well.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: I'm just saying. I mean, I'm a pilot, I know the deal with the aircraft.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: You're lucky, Lancet-2, you can just switch into sleep mode when you're bored. I was out for twelve hours yesterday, so I'm wide awake.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Well, actually, I have no ability to feel 'boredom'.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Although I do understand what this feeling is, Mr. Dylan. The lovely Ms. Closure complains about these things a lot. And it causes her to behave in strange ways.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: ...I think about this sometimes, Lancet-2, are we totally sure you and the other bots don't have a human crammed up in there anywhere?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: We don't. My interior is a precisely-designed circuitry construct. Do you want to see?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Although, since I have been programmed with a female personality, I may act out in unexpected ways when presenting my body to the opposite sex.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Err, I'll pass.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: If was going to see anything, I'd definitely prefer a swimsuit at a time like this.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: A swimsuit?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Yeah, it's summertime. That's when you put on a swimsuit and go play in the water.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: In that case, I'll play an audio recording of various sea sounds for you.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: No thanks, it'd only make me feel worse.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: ...Then maybe... Mr. Dylan would like to see me in a swimsuit?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Definitely not!
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. I am only a robot, after all.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Err, I'm the one who's sorry. I didn't mean it like that.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. By the way, have you seen the sea, Mr. Dylan?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Um, I have. I'm thinking it was that time we loaned Master SilverAsh an aircraft last summer after a schedule change mixed things up. I flew him there.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: It turns out, the place was a major vacation spot. Master SilverAsh made me a VIP guest.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Man, that's when I realized how us poor folks could scarcely imagine what the rich live like.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Here, I've got the pictures with me.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: You long for this kind of life, Mr. Dylan?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hm? I mean... that was a really great couple of days, but if my whole life was like that, I don't think I'd ever get used to it.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: I'm more of an instant-noodles-in-the-cockpit kind of guy. With an inverted sleep schedule to boot.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Oh you can't do that. Let me formulate a healthy lifestyle plan for you.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: No thanks, I'm good!
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Too bad. The lovely Ms. Closure created this feature for me, but no one uses it. Not her, not the Doctor.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Haha, sounds about right.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Oh, but that reminds me, the tribes here live so much better than I thought. They really want for nothing.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Yes, life here is less convenient and comfortable than the world we know, but not to any significant degree.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: According to my records, your health has improved in the past two days.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Turns out returning to nature will do that for you. Heh. I guess this is the life that everyone came from.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I just remembered, Gavial said something about a gigantic waterfall in the rainforest that way. I'd love to go there when the Doctor gets back.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: They may have already gone that way.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: The Doctor is a good boss. And I know our friends wouldn't abandon us to go play under the waterfall!
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: True. Then let's wait patiently.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Is there a 'Dylan' here?
That's me!
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Huh? You speak Sargonian?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Yes. And you're here with the machine. Right, it must be you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The one called 'Doctor' asked me to give you this note.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hm? Let's see here...
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: ...Lancet-2, looks like we've got work to do.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Wow! I could hear the roar of the water from so far away, I never knew waterfalls even got this big!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hah, I didn't steer you wrong, did I?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sure enough. I guess I'll forgive you~
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Haha! It really is an incredible waterfall.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Looks like Tomimi isn't here yet, so let's take a little break.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hooray! I can finally get some use out of my swimsuit~
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You got a lotta fight in you, squirt.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Kemar, well aware of the language barrier, communicates with her stance, rather than words.
Heh. Seeing as I've got nothing else to do, we might as well go a few rounds.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze is really going at it hard with that girl over there.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Sure is.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I don't see what's so fun about fighting.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...I heard you singin' a whole 'nother tune last time you was fightin', Utage.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ahahaha. I guess you're right.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hey, Croissant, that isn't a swimsuit, is it?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ahahaha, ya got me. It's just some outdoorsy getup I snagged. Plenty waterproof, so we'n pretend it's a swimsuit.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You're a real function over form kinda girl, huh?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But hey, it may not be a beach, but playing around a waterfall is pretty great too! It's got that real 'back to nature' vibe. Too bad I didn't bring my camera.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ya got that right. I ain't never been out in the wilds like this before. I'm havin' a ball!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Whassat?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Am I seeing things?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Isn't that Kay?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: How do you like the waterfall, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hah, I used to love coming here to bathe.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Looks like you've got a lot on your mind, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're cruisin' for a bruisin', Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: From here it's just a short walk to Zumama's tribe.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: When I got that letter from Tomimi, I never thought things would turn out like this.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: ...Oh, Doctor, there's one thing that's been really gnawing at my brain these past few days. We're friends, right? I wanna ask you about it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Do you think...?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doooctooor!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What's happening? I'm trying to talk to the Doctor here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Look over there!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Is that... Kay?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I found it! The Mushroom Sea!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Bath time!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Looks like she's still off in la la land.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But she's just so cute rolling around in the water like that.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Gah, stupid kid.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How about we just let her play for a while...?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Anyway, Doctor, what I wanted to ask wasâ€”
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Do you think my tail's gotten fatter?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What? Really? I guess I'm going on a diet when we get back.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Come on, Doctor, don't look at me like that. An Archosauria's tail is her most prized asset! This is my life!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Pfft, I knew I shouldn't have asked you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You don't know, Tomimi's tail wasn't always that fat. And I don't want mine to end up like hers.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: What do you think about Zumama?;......;Let's talk about tails more.

attributes.content: Huh? What do I think about her?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I guess I think she's real tough, and she can make a helluva machine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I had a feeling you'd be down with tails!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: There's Tomimi. You done with that thing?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hmmmmm?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: You're a cutie! Gavial, I never knew you had a friend like this. I thought you just hung around with other muscleheaded lunks like you.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: That was uncalled for!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: She's got perfect skin, refined features, and a gothy outfit that really goes with her complexion.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Gothy? Is that in?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, no. But it's popular with a certain crowd.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I-I picked it up from a magazine. They said it's how they dress in the outside world.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh, no, girl, honey. You've got a critically flawed understanding of fashion here. But that's okay. I mean, look at this place. I totally get why you'd come up with something like that.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But don't worry, you just let Big Sister Utage fill you with her bottomless, extra-thick fashion wisdom!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Gavial, I'm borrowing her!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Wha? Whaaaaaaa?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Sure, knock yourself out.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Anyway, we're all here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'll see if I can get Kay to sober up...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Break time's over! Kay is back in the fight!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Gavial, she's makin' a break for it again!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Grr, everybody, get your clothes on! We're going after her!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That direction... it's the way to Zumama's tribe...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hold on! Did you really change that fast?!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Wait up!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Why bother changing? Just go!
attributes.name: Blaze
